<title level="1" right="Rules">[Armor and Skills](/Rules.aspx?ID=2138)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 226 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some armor imposes a penalty on specific skill checks and DCs. If a creature is wearing armor that imparts a skill penalty, that penalty is applied to the creature’s Strength- and Dexterity-based skill checks and skill DCs, unless the action has the attack trait. Check penalties from armor are detailed [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=2173).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
